sentences.en: A great deal of media hype surrounded the release of the group’s latest CD.
sentences.cn: 媒体对这个组合最新唱片的发行进行了大肆炒作。

sentences.en: Doubtless he was justified in some of his criticism of the media.
sentences.cn: 他对媒体的一些批评性言论无疑是合乎情理的。

sentences.en: I don't think they're just jazzing it up for the media.
sentences.cn: 我并不认为他们仅仅是为了吸引媒体的目光才把它搞得有声有色的。

sentences.en: It could well turn into some kind of a media circus.
sentences.cn: 这很可能会演变成媒体的一场闹剧。

sentences.en: The 11-day trial generated intense media interest .
sentences.cn: 11天的审讯引起了媒体的高度关注。

sentences.en: The attentions of the media reduced her to tears.
sentences.cn: 媒体的关注把她弄哭了。

sentences.en: The British media is in the hands of clubby men.
sentences.cn: 英国媒体掌握在一群排外的人手中。

sentences.en: The broadcast media sniffily affects to distance itself from the press.
sentences.cn: 广播媒体态度轻蔑地故作姿态，要跟新闻媒体保持距离。

sentences.en: The couple married in the Caribbean to avoid a media circus.
sentences.cn: 为了摆脱媒体的关注，这对新人在加勒比喜结连理。

sentences.en: The media have also abetted the feeling of unreality.
sentences.cn: 媒体也在一旁对这种非现实感推波助澜。

sentences.en: The media is full of shock-horror headlines about under-age crime.
sentences.cn: 媒体上充斥着各种关于未成年人犯罪的骇人听闻的新闻标题。

sentences.en: The media seems obsessed with hyping up individuals or groups.
sentences.cn: 媒体似乎热衷于大肆吹捧某些个人或团体。

sentences.en: The media, meanwhile, has blown hot and cold on the affair.
sentences.cn: 同时，媒体对这件事的态度表现得忽冷忽热。

sentences.en: The new media are unlikely to prove qualitatively different from the old.
sentences.cn: 新媒体不可能与旧媒体有质的差别。

sentences.en: The role of the news media in forming public opinion is very important.
sentences.cn: 新闻媒体对于社会舆论的形成具有非常重要的作用。

sentences.en: The scandal was widely reported in the national media .
sentences.cn: 这一丑闻在全国媒体上被广泛报道。

sentences.en: The Spanish media were still sniping at the British press yesterday.
sentences.cn: 西班牙媒体昨天仍然在攻击英国媒体。

sentences.en: There will be another war somewhere else and the whole international media circus will move on.
sentences.cn: 别的地方还会有战争，全球的媒体又会一窝蜂地拥过去。

sentences.en: This image is a myth perpetuated by the media.
sentences.cn: 这种形象是媒体宣传造成的错觉。

sentences.en: What the media should not do is to exploit people's natural fears.
sentences.cn: 媒体不应该利用人们天生的恐惧心理。

trans.tran_en: all the organizations, such as television, radio, and newspapers, that provide news and information for the public, or the people who do this work
